targets.rawSql: SELECT * FROM "siem"."syslog" ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1000
SELECT received, device, type, lvl, action, msg FROM "siem"."events" ORDER BY received ASC LIMIT 10000
SELECT $__timeInterval(received) as "time", in_bytes FROM "siem"."netflow" WHERE ( time >= $__fromTime AND time <= $__toTime ) GROUP BY in_bytes, time ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 10000
SELECT dst_asn, dst_asn_org, in_bytes FROM siem.netflow ORDER BY in_bytes DESC
SELECT src_asn, src_asn_org, in_bytes FROM siem.netflow ORDER BY in_bytes DESC
SELECT received AS time, proto, dst_port, dst4_addr FROM "siem"."netflow" where proto='tcp' ORDER BY time
select src_port, src4_addr, sum(in_bytes)  FROM siem.netflow WHERE ( first >= $__fromTime AND first <= $__toTime ) AND proto='tcp' GROUP BY src_port, src4_addr
SELECT proto, src_port, src4_addr, in_bytes FROM "siem"."netflow" where proto='tcp'
select dst_port, dst4_addr, sum(in_bytes) FROM siem.netflow WHERE proto='udp' AND dst_port >= 0 GROUP BY dst_port, dst4_addr
select received as time, src_port, src4_addr, sum(in_bytes) FROM siem.netflow WHERE proto='udp' AND src_port >= 0 GROUP BY time, src_port, src4_addr ORDER BY time DESC
SELECT sum(in_bytes), proto FROM "siem"."netflow" GROUP BY proto LIMIT 10000
